Game.title: Higher!
Game.blurb: A game of psychology, strategy, and bluffing for three or more players.

Description.p: This game involves winning the most tricks. You win a trick by playing the highest value card in the trick.

ol.li: Shuffle all the cards and place them in a pile
Ensure all the players have joined the game
Follow the prompt, and start drawing cards. The app will tell you when to stop drawing
Place any left over cards from the draw pile to one side
The app will nominate a player to go first, this player places their a card of their choice face up
All other players go, they place their cards face down
The player who played the highest value card wins the trick and goes first for the next round

Description.p: The game finishes once everyone has no more cards in their hand. The player with the most tricks wins!
